mapper.insert: insert into USERS (user_id, user_password, user_passwordCheck, user_name, user_birth, user_phonenumber, user_email, user_address, enabled) values (#{user_id}, #{user_password}, #{user_passwordCheck}, #{user_name}, #{user_birth}, #{user_phonenumber}, #{user_email}, #{user_address}, 1)
mapper.select: select user_password from USERS where user_id=#{id}
